reporter_caption.center: JOHNSON v. LBM CONSTRUCTION, INC., 13 A.D.3d 1136 [4th Dept 2004]

caption.center: KEVIN JOHNSON, Appellant, v. LBM CONSTRUCTION, INC., et al., Respondents.
ORCHARD GLEN RESIDENCES AND CARRIAGE HOMES, LLC, Third-Party Plaintiff, v.
MANDON BUILDING SYSTEMS, INC., Third-Party Defendant-Respondent. LBM
CONSTRUCTION, INC., Third-Party Plaintiff, v. MANDON BUILDING SYSTEMS,

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Fourth Department.

opinion.posture: Appeal from an order of the Supreme Court, Erie County (Eugene M. Fahey, J.), entered July 11, 2003. The order granted the motions of defendants and third-party defendant for summary judgment dismissing the amended complaint and denied the motion of plaintiff for partial summary judgment on the issue of liability under Labor Law ยง 240 (1).Page 1137
opinion.panel: Before: Pigott, Jr., P.J., Green, Hurlbutt, Martoche and Hayes, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: It is hereby ordered that the order so appealed from be and the same hereby is unanimously affirmed without costs for reasons stated in decision at Supreme Court.
